record.description: Scientific experiments on the regulatory phenomena in bacteria pick up at the point where they were interrupted during the move into the new $12,000,000 Cummings Life Science Center on the University of Chicago Campus. Laboratories such as this one are supported by forty-four environmental rooms where temperature and humidity are closely controlled.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: From a press release from the University of Chicago Office of Public Information.
